title: Our Clean Village
summary: This book teaches the importance of keeping our surroundings clean. By working together, we can create a happy and healthy community.

texts: There is a lot of trash on the street.
Throw trash in the trash can.
Some trash should be collected together.
Plastic trash should be put in a separate bin.
Food waste should also be separated.
Do not throw trash anywhere you want.
A clean neighborhood, a happy life.
Let's take care of our environment.

preQuestions.question: Why is cleaning the village important?

postQuestions.question: How can we keep our surroundings clean every day?

missions.title: Clean-Up Together
missions.description: Work with your friends to clean your classroom or village area and talk about how it felt.

vocabulary.definition: The place where we live, including land, water, air, and all living things.
A container where you put waste or garbage.
